A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TLJ was a real disappointment. For one there was lots of plot holes that I could not overlook. Manly though I was disappointed with the story and the direction the film took. I thought it was going to be a grittier darker film like the Empire Strikes back but it didn't even come close. Also i thought it would expand the characters and their past but didn't do any of that either. Overall I thought it was really bad. I will probably watch it again someday but I doubt it will change m opinion.
